L

linkCategory - Variable in class com.amazon.pages.AmazonHamburgerMenuPage
String variable to store the Xpath of category link to be selected from Hamburger Menu

By locator variable to store the element of the link Back to Main menu
linkSortIcon - Variable in class com.amazon.pages.AmazonCategoryPage
By locator variable to store the link of sort dropdown icon
linkSubCategory - Variable in class com.amazon.pages.AmazonHamburgerMenuPage
String variable to store the Xpath of sub-category link to be selected from Hamburger Menu
ListenerClass - Class in com.amazon.listeners
A Test listener class implementing the TestNG Listener ITestListener to listen to the Tests run by the Framework.

localDriver - Static variable in class com.amazon.driver.DriverManager
ThreadLocal variable of WebDriver instances for each thread to have their own reference
log(LogType, String) - Static method in class com.amazon.reports.FrameworkLogger
Method to log the status with the message using Consumer Interface
logInfoList(List<String>) - Static method in class com.amazon.reports.FrameworkLogger
Method to log the status Info with the message in List format using Consumer Interface
LogType - Enum in com.amazon.enums
Custom Enum with the list of log types to be added to Framework Logger for logging any status
